'''Noctis Skin Pack''', known as '''FINAL FANTASY XV Skin Pack''' before it was renamed on some platforms,<ref>{{Mcnet|final-fantasy-xv-skin-pack-out-now|Final Fantasy XV Skin Pack out now|April 24, 2018|Per Landin}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 43 skins of characters from the action role-playing game ''{{Wikipedia|Final Fantasy XV}}''.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Join Noctis, Gladio, Ignis and Prompto once again as they venture beyond the world of Eos and into the untold realms of Minecraft with this fantastic skin pack. Be it friend or foe, the cast of FINAL FANTASY XV follows, including Cindy, Aranea, Ardyn, the Astrals and many more.|Xbox 360 Marketplace description}}
{{Quote|Join Noctis, Gladio, Ignis and Prompto once again as they venture beyond the world of Eos and into the untold realms of Minecraft with this fantastic skin pack. Be it friend or foe, the cast of beloved characters follows, including Cindy, Aranea, Ardyn, the Astrals and many more.|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
